cn.title: 比特派钱包关于支持BSV创世纪升级硬分叉的公告

message.data: BSV将于2020年2月4日进行“创世纪升级硬分叉”，比特派团队已经做好了支持此次硬分叉的准备。分叉期间，比特派将暂停BSV的收发及相关功能（具体暂停时间另行通知），待网络平稳运行后恢复相关功能。

en.title: Bitpie ANN for supporting BSV Genesis Upgrade

message.data: BSV blockchain will implement the Genesis Upgrade hard fork  on Feb 4th, 2020. Bitpie Team already well prepared for this upgrade. BSV Send/Receive will be suspend during the upgrade, and all related functions will be recover after the network is stable.
